name: Beyond the Chromatic Arc
description:
In Beyond the Chromatic Arc you semi-control a colorful rectangle bound to conquer the perils of neverending space. Each run will provide you with resources based on how far you got that can be spent to upgrade your rectangle for future voyages.

Features:

  • Endless gameplay
  • Single input control through left mouse click
  • Sandboxmode to heavily increase or decrease the game difficulty

How to play:

Launch your rectangle via left mouse click.

While flying the ship it will slightly pivot towards your cursor and you can use a teleport via left mouseclick. A subtle glow around the rectangle will show you if this teleport is ready again.

You will collect resources at the end of a run based on three criteria:

  1. The distance between your end- and startpoint
  2. The total distance travelled
  3. The longest distance travelled in one launch

Spending these resources on upgrades will increase the resourceyield of future runs.
